data.message: hi Facebook  .  help me please.. i want to back my timeline to the old style . i don't like the new one . how can i do that

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Mohammad. Updates are necessary to keep up with ever-changing technology. Is there something from the last version that you miss the most? Let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1lXdJEq - Kristen

Advertisements are huge
- Posts are shortened and cluttered
- Everything is big and blocky
- New color scheme
- Difficult for people with poor eyesight
 "Please return the Newsfeed to the previous style.  :)
yessssssssssssssss  pls  we like  the old style Petra Radke,  pls  :)  Facebook :)
I am wondering wow to get rid of Times New Roman in embedded links in the feed mainly?? If all would be helvetica family I would not have so much trouble with the new design.
I've already wrote my feedback. Please, restore the previous layout

Facebook , kapanırsa twittermi takılacaksınız ?  :)

O Yüzden Sizler için Peslooku kurduk... Haydi sende Peslokla ;)
Peslook.com Türkiyenin Yenin Sosyal Ağ Sitesi. ♥
How can I change it back to the previous style? The new style sucks!!!
When my timeline will be updated? I have oldest style ever... :|

When will we see the new timeline... My friend has the newest one where everything is on the left side of the screen... i want that too... and please let me have control of my facebook back... I cant add no friends... people will go back to myspace again if this keeps on...
